name: graylog
description: Open source log management. Centralize and aggregate all your log files for 100% visibility. Use our powerful query language to search through terabytes of log data to discover and analyze important information.
preInstallNotes: Graylog requires per default 1 CPU, 4096 MB of RAM and a running Elasticsearch and MongoDB cluster. More informations can be found in the Advanced Installation and on the documentation page: http://docs.graylog.org/en/2.0/
